title: Sonia Manzano: These Are The Muppets In Your Neighborhood (R)
description: Sonia Manzano talks about retiring from her role as Maria on Sesame Street after 44 years. And Emilio Delgado, who plays her TV husband Luis, joins for a game about the lesser-known puppets in the show's past.
